title: Prevailing Wage Bill, National Politics Review, How The Middle Class Is Changing
teaser: While many agree that a strong middle class is important for a healthy economy, fewer can agree on what "middle-class" really means. We discuss who makes up the middle class, and how things have changed. We also examine the latest news out of Washington this week, and cover today's public hearing on a bill that would repeal the state's prevailing wage law.
